name: Skyscraper
storyline: The largest Battle Royale Festival in the universe of the Skyscraper. It's called "G0" for short In the past, there was a Colosseum, but in 2045 it is 'G0'! Urban Battle Tour in abandoned urban stadiums, It is F1 of Battle Royale. The world is watched through live broadcasts. The world's largest Battle Show by unique participants. It doesn't matter border, race or gender! Anyone welcome if put your life on the line.
summary: 'Skyscraper' is a battle royale shooter game that tells the story of hikers who participated in the Super Bullet Grand Prix. Play a variety of unique Hikers, play a variety of gameplay using battle gears, and freely roam around the city through zipline and parkour to win the Super Bullet Grand Prix!
